rawPortfolioParameters


Valid input parameters for the PACTA workflow. Less than full parameters, since PACTA handles inheritence.

  • Option 1
  • portfolioParameters.json
root anyOf item 0
Type: object

The following properties are required:

  • inherit
root anyOf portfolioParameters.json
Type: object

Full Parameters required to run workflow.pacta.

  • Requirement 1
  • Requirement 2
root anyOf portfolioParameters allOf item 0
Type: object

The following properties are required:

  • portfolio
  • analysis
root anyOf portfolioParameters allOf item 1

Must not be:

root anyOf portfolioParameters allOf item 1 not
Type: object

The following properties are required:

  • inherit

root anyOf portfolioParameters portfolio
Type: object

Definition for PACTA portfolio object

Same definition as portfolio

root anyOf portfolioParameters analysis
Type: object

Analysis parameters.

root anyOf portfolioParameters analysis equityMarketList
Type: array of enum (of string)

List of equity markets to be analyzed.

 No Additional Items

Each item of this array must be:

root anyOf portfolioParameters analysis equityMarketList equityMarketList items
Type: enum (of string)

Must be one of:

  • "DevelopedMarket"
  • "EmergingMarket"
  • "GlobalMarket"

root anyOf portfolioParameters analysis scenarioGeographiesList
Type: array of enum (of string)

List of scenario geographies to be analyzed.

 No Additional Items

Each item of this array must be:

root anyOf portfolioParameters analysis scenarioGeographiesList scenarioGeographiesList items
Type: enum (of string)

Must be one of:

  • "Global"
  • "GlobalAggregate"
  • "NonOECD"
  • "OECD"

root anyOf portfolioParameters analysis scenarioSourcesList
Type: array of enum (of string)

List of scenario sources to be used.

 No Additional Items

Each item of this array must be:

root anyOf portfolioParameters analysis scenarioSourcesList scenarioSourcesList items
Type: enum (of string)

Must be one of:

  • "GECO2022"
  • "GECO2023"
  • "ISF2021"
  • "ISF2023"
  • "WEO2022"
  • "WEO2023"

root anyOf portfolioParameters analysis sectorList
Type: array of enum (of string)

List of PACTA sectors to be analyzed.

 No Additional Items

Each item of this array must be:

root anyOf portfolioParameters analysis sectorList sectorList items
Type: enum (of string)

Must be one of:

  • "Automotive"
  • "Aviation"
  • "Cement"
  • "Coal"
  • "Oil&Gas"
  • "Power"
  • "Steel"

root anyOf portfolioParameters analysis startYear
Type: integer

Start year of the analysis.

Value must be greater or equal to 2022

root anyOf portfolioParameters analysis timeHorizon
Type: integer

Time horizon of the analysis.

Value must be greater or equal to 1

Additional Properties of any type are allowed.

root anyOf portfolioParameters additionalProperties
Type: object

root portfolio
Type: object

Definition for PACTA portfolio object

 No Additional Properties

root portfolio files
Type: array of string

List of portfolio files to be analyzed.

 No Additional Items

Each item of this array must be:

root portfolio files files items
Type: string

Path to the file.

root portfolio holdingsDate
Type: enum (of string)Format: date

Date of the holdings data.

Must be one of:

  • "2022-12-31"
  • "2023-12-31"

root portfolio name
Type: string

Name of the portfolio.

root inherit
Type: string

Path to a file with inheritance information.

Additional Properties of any type are allowed.

root additionalProperties
Type: object
